entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Rain mixed with drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
